name: SeattleCurbIt
0:
”Alexa, open Seattle Curb It”
”Alexa, ask Seattle Curb It for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: seattle curb it
des:
Have you ever forgotten if recycling pickup is this week or next week? How about wanting to check if a holiday changed your collection day?

This skill allows Alexa to ask Seattle Public Utilities about your curbside waste collection schedule so you can hear when and what you should set out for collection. You can say, "Alexa, open Seattle Curb It" to get started.

For the skill to look up your collection information, your device's street address must be entered in the same format used by Seattle Public Utilities. You can use SPU's online tool to confirm your street address format:

https://myutilities.seattle.gov/eportal/#/accountlookup/calendar
